item.title: Commands & key bindings reminders
item.description: Commands & key bindings reminders Sysdig Record activity to file: $ sudo sysdig -w tracefile.scap Get top cpu usage from the trace file: $ sudo sysdig -r tracefile.scap -c topprocs_cpu Check open TCP port with bash and send data to TCP port $ man bash [ ... ] REDIRECTION [ ... ] Bash handles several filenames specially when they are used in redirections, as described in the following table: /dev/tcp/host/port If host is a valid hostname or Internet address, and port is an integer port number or service name, bash attempts to open a TCP connection to the corresponding socket.
